message:
Flight Departure Reminder

Flight Number: {{doc.name}} Departure Time: {{time_of_departure}} Departure Date: {{date_of_departure}} Destination: {{destination_airport}}

Dear Passenger,

This is a reminder that your flight {{doc.name}} to {{destination_airport}} is scheduled to depart at {{time_of_departure}} on from {{date_of_departure}}. Please ensure that you arrive at the airport at least 2 hours before your departure time to allow for check-in and security procedures.

We wish you a pleasant and safe journey! Safe travels,
name: Flights Departure
subject: {{doc.name}} Departs in 24 hours!
